title: The Bachelorette SPOILER: Scot Fuller locks lips with former Bachelor star Tara Maree
text:
He is still in the running to win Angie Kent's heart.

But it appears The Bachelorette contender Scot Fuller has found love elsewhere, as he was spotted locking lips with fellow reality TV star Tara Maree on Brighton Beach in Melbourne, earlier this month.

The 27-year-old, who is currently starring on the Channel 10 series, certainly looked smitten with the blonde former Bachelor contestant as they walked hand in hand along the sand.

Whoops! It appears The Bachelorette contender Scot Fuller, who is still in the running to win Angie Kent's heart, has found love elsewhere, as he was spotted locking lips with fellow reality TV star Tara Maree on Brighton Beach in Melbourne, earlier this month

At one point, Scot wrapped his arm around his new love interest, pulling her close as he kissed the side of her head.

Looking happy and relaxed, the lovebirds could barely keep their hands off each other.

Tara, who was eliminated in the second episode of Matt Agnew's season of The Bachelor, cut a casual figure for her beach date.

Smitten! The 27-year-old, who is currently starring on the Channel 10 series, certainly looked smitten with the blonde former Bachelor contestant as they walked hand in hand along the sand

Cute: Looking happy and relaxed, the lovebirds could barely keep their hands off each other

She was dressed in a light green off the shoulder crop top and a black, flowing midi skirt.

The 25-year-old wore her blonde locks in long, loose curls and opted for natural make-up to show off her healthy glow.

Meanwhile, Scot looked every bit the surfer in blue swim shorts, a baggy white t-shirt and sunglasses.

Looking good: Tara was dressed in a light green off the shoulder crop top and a black, flowing midi skirt

Locking lips! The Bachelorette contender and his fellow reality TV star enjoyed a cheeky smooch

The loved-up pair put on a tactile display as they wrapped their arms around one another.

The Bachelorette contestant then pulled his new beau in for a passionate kiss.

Before leaving the beach, they were later spotted enjoying a cheeky smooch while sitting down on a step outside a beach box.

Casual: Tara wore her blonde locks in loose curls for her trip and opted for natural make-up to show off her healthy glow

Get a room! The couple were later spotted enjoying a cheeky smooch while sitting down on a step of one of a beach box

Scot is one of 13 contestants left battling it out to win the former Gogglebox star's heart.

But having failed to secure a solo date with the blonde, he's not expected to last much longer.
description: The Bachelorette contender Scot Fuller and fellow reality TV star Tara Maree (pictured) were spotted kissing on the beach.
authors: Jess Bell For Daily Mail Australia
